details.description: The BCECE examination is conducted annually by the Bihar Combined Entrance Competitive Examination Board (BCECEB). The examination is open to candidates who have completed their 12th class and are seeking admission to undergraduate programs in various fields such as engineering, pharmacy, agriculture, and others. The examination consists of multiple-choice questions and other types of questions. The exam dates for the BCECE examination are usually announced in May each year.

name: Bihar School Examination Council (BSEBC) Senior Secondary (SR) Exam
Bihar Combined Entrance Competitive Examination Board

details.Exam Details: The Bihar Combined Engineering College Entrance Test (BCECE) is conducted by the BCECE Board. The exam is for admission to the Polytechnic courses in various engineering colleges of Bihar.
details.Eligibility Criteria: The candidate must be a resident of Bihar and must have passed the 12th standard examination from any recognized board.
